verbs.description: [V: hate] [ARG1: how sf changed head to this neighborhood] now if you want a taste of the city as its unassuming old self head to the richmond district i grew up there decades ago and whenever i go back it looks pretty much the same same tasty hamburger spot same favorite bakery same movie theaters same drippy fog burma apple richmond district richmond district san francisco schubert apple store everlane clement — san francisco clement mountain lake park bill ariscault bakery richmond sf geary
